 this three year project (2002-2005), in collaboration with Prof.

n (OSU) and Prof. Ken Waldron (Stanford), Passino contributed 
expertise in=
 evolutionary algorithms for design and biomimicry for 
engineering walking=
 robots (e.g., for robot maneuver parameter design 
and control design).

ttp://www.ece.osu.edu/~passino/projects.html
